summary: State Street’s ‘Mega’ Crypto Plan, Hayes Pleads Guilty, Flexpool’s Message to Russia, Pulled NFT Sale + More news
title: State Street’s ‘Mega’ Crypto Plan, Hayes Pleads Guilty, Flexpool’s Message to Russia, Pulled NFT Sale + More news
content: Get your daily, bite-sized digest of cryptoasset and blockchain-related news – investigating the stories flying under the radar of today’s crypto news.

"Russia invaded Ukraine so we need to regulate crypto" is a mind-boggling non-sequitur totally devoid of any logical justification, representing either a substantial deficit in expertise on both crypto & foreign policy, or an overt attempt to exploit a crisis for unrelated goals.

____
(Updated at 18:23 UTC with the Regulation news section.)
